name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
Beat butter and sugars until creamy
Add eggs and vanilla, beat well
Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased cookie sheets
Bake 9-11 minutes or until golden brown
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes, then remove to wire rack
notes: For chewier cookies, use more brown sugar. For crispier cookies, use more white sugar.
